name: DualSpirits
description:
Travel as a monk and experience the puzzling challenges of life and death facing monsters that bar your way. 

Game Made for the Seattle Indies Global Game Jam 2022

Credit:

Bone - Lead Programmer, Programming Design, Game Tester

Evesprite - Composer, Sound Design, Producer, Level Designer

Skymoon - Animator, Concept Designer, Artist

Controls: 

-Space to Jump

-Arrow Keys to Move Around

- R to Restart level
